column4: hello is there a specific channel for wireless networking support or should I just ask in here?

Ok I checked the forums already. I am just trying to find out which encryption is best supported (if any) in Ubuntu Edgy.  I would like to use at least WEP but even with that I don't seem to be able to connect.
the best supported depends on your wifi chipset if in fact you're referring to wifi at all.
yes wifi. Ok my chipset is likely quite old. :-/
